## Overview

This dashboard was designed to track crime incidence in Mexico City during 2019-2024 by time, gender, age, mayorship and neighborhood.

- **Data Sources**: The data comes from Mexico City Open Data Webpage.
- **Key Metrics**: The dashboard shows crime KPIs.
- **Visualizations**: The types of charts used are bar and map charts.
- **Target Audience**: The dashboard was designed for crime incidence follow-up.
